channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Why Joe Biden’s Doctor Can’t Legally Refuse To Testify About Biden’s Dementia While President
item.description: Dr. O’Connor cannot cite doctor/patient privilege and medical ethics as reasons why he cannot disclose information about Biden's health.
